docs.snippet: Despite the international jet-set crowd that swarms José Ignacio each winter, this quiet village on the Uruguayan coast is determined to preserve its small-town roots.
docs.abstract: Despite the international jet-set crowd that swarms José Ignacio each winter, this quiet village on the Uruguayan coast is determined to preserve its small-town roots.

docs.snippet: Darko Saric, described as running a drug ring that stretched from Latin American to Europe, agreed to turn himself in, officials said.
docs.lead_paragraph: Darko Saric, described as running a drug ring that stretched from Latin American to Europe, agreed to turn himself in, officials said.
docs.abstract: Darko Saric, described as being among most feared and wanted drug traffickers in Balkans, is arrested in Serbia and charged with smuggling more than five tons of cocaine and laundering at least $30 million; authorities say he has been at helm of elaborate drug ring stretching from South America to western Europe.

headline.main: Major Balkan Drug Trafficker Arrested in Serbia, Authorities Say
headline.print_headline: Serbia: Drug Trafficker Arrested, Officials Say

docs.snippet: Uruguay has agreed with the United States to accept some prisoners held in the much-criticized detention center at the U.S. military base of Guantanamo Bay, President Jose Mujica said on Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay has agreed with the United States to accept some prisoners held in the much-criticized detention center at the U.S. military base of Guantanamo Bay, President Jose Mujica said on Thursday.

headline.main: Uruguay Agrees to U.S. Request to Take Some Guantanamo Inmates
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Agrees to U.S. Request to Take Some Guantanamo Inmates

docs.snippet: Uruguay's president indicated Thursday he's open to taking some former terror suspects still held at Guantanamo Bay, but the U.S. ambassador in the country cautioned that no agreement has been reached.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay's president indicated Thursday he's open to taking some former terror suspects still held at Guantanamo Bay, but the U.S. ambassador in the country cautioned that no agreement has been reached.

headline.main: Uruguay Leader Open to Guantanamo Detainees
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Leader Open to Guantanamo Detainees

docs.snippet: Uruguay has asked the United States to free Cuban prisoners as a gesture in return for the South American country agreeing to accept detainees from the much-criticized Guantanamo detention center, President Jose Mujica said on Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay has asked the United States to free Cuban prisoners as a gesture in return for the South American country agreeing to accept detainees from the much-criticized Guantanamo detention center, President Jose Mujica said on Friday.

headline.main: Uruguay Asks U.S. to Free Cubans in Return for Guantanamo Transfer
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Asks U.S. to Free Cubans in Return for Guantanamo Transfer

docs.snippet: Uruguay's president on Friday asked the United States to free three Cuban prisoners in exchange for receiving five Guantanamo Bay detainees.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay's president on Friday asked the United States to free three Cuban prisoners in exchange for receiving five Guantanamo Bay detainees.

headline.main: Uruguay President Asks US to Free Cuban Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Uruguay President Asks US to Free Cuban Prisoners

docs.snippet: Chelsea ripped apart 10-man Premier League title rivals Arsenal in a 6-0 mauling on Saturday to ensure Arsene Wenger's 1,000th game turned sour as Liverpool and Manchester City kept up the pressure with big wins.
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea ripped apart 10-man Premier League title rivals Arsenal in a 6-0 mauling on Saturday to ensure Arsene Wenger's 1,000th game turned sour as Liverpool and Manchester City kept up the pressure with big wins.

headline.main: Chelsea Hit Arsenal for Six, Liverpool and City Win
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Hit Arsenal for Six, Liverpool and City Win

docs.snippet: A suspected Balkan drug boss pleaded not guilty Monday to charges that he trafficked 5.7 tons of cocaine from South America to Europe and laundered millions of dollars in drug money.
docs.lead_paragraph: A suspected Balkan drug boss pleaded not guilty Monday to charges that he trafficked 5.7 tons of cocaine from South America to Europe and laundered millions of dollars in drug money.

headline.main: Suspected Balkan Drug Boss Pleads Not Guilty
headline.print_headline: Suspected Balkan Drug Boss Pleads Not Guilty

docs.snippet: Uruguay's president says any Guantanamo detainees his country takes will be treated as refugees and will be free to travel wherever they wish, even if they have promised the United States that they'll stay in the South American country for at least...
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay's president says any Guantanamo detainees his country takes will be treated as refugees and will be free to travel wherever they wish, even if they have promised the United States that they'll stay in the South American country for at least two years.

headline.main: Mujica: Guantanamo Detainees Could Leave Uruguay
headline.print_headline: Mujica: Guantanamo Detainees Could Leave Uruguay
